You must have heard of this game before... it's one of those games that everyone should have played. While it's short, it is so incredibly well done that I recommend this to basically anyone (unless you *really* hate puzzle games with a passion).
It's regularly on sale in a bundle together with Portal 2 (also amazing!) for <2.50‚Ç¨.

It has a very unique concept, a neat story with super great story telling that also doesn't fall short on humor. The (as of writing this) 97% positive reviews are given for a reason!
Lots of fun.  the puzzles were pretty straightforward but still a good time.  good way to kill 3 hours

Yeah, its great. Portal is that special kind of game that is especially iconic, and for good reason. The witty humor, excellent gameplay, and atmospheric setting are all top notch. Its too short, however, only taking about 2-3 hours for the main story.

Uma premissa simples e um roteiro bem pensado fazem de Portal uma baita adi√ß√£o √† biblioteca de qualquer um. Al√©m de estimular o conhecimento b√°sico dos fen√¥menos f√≠sicos, estimula a curiosidade com essa hist√≥ria estranhamento atraente. Curto e direto ao ponto, Portal certamente marcou √©poca e vale a pena uma jogada.

Amongst any gamer's all time favourites! This game mixes the elements of a puzzle game,an action FPS and has tons of humor sprinkled in.Amazing game,brilliant concept,mind-blowing experience.The only thing that's bad about it is that I won't ever be able to play it for the first time again.

95/100
Amazing game by Valve, with one of the best game endings I've played in a while. You're basically a test subject working for a corporation called Aperture Science Labs. Throughout the game, you hear the voice of a robot named Glados, she(or he I don't even know) guides you through the 19 stages of the game. The ending to the game is just fantastic and I don't want to spoil it, but play the game and find out yourself. I bet you my left nut you're gonna be mindblown if you haven't already played the game even though you probably have. This is one of those games that is fantastic in terms of gameplay and in terms of story. It's a very fun game, and I highly recommend you play it.
Don't read reviews. Just get it.
